Mak Iyah, Wanita Usia 100 Tahun Sebatang Kara di Cianjur Memperoleh Bantuan
06 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Shofira Hanan
HARAPAN untuk mendapatkan hidup yang lebih layak, sedikit demi sedikit dirasakan oleh Rukiyah (100) atau akrab disapa Mak Iyah. Wanita yang hidup seorang diri di Kampung Baru Kupa RT 05/03, Desa Sukatani, Kecamatan Pacet itu, mulai mendapat banyak bantuan dari berbagai pihak yang berempati atas nasibnya.
Selama puluhan tahun, Mak Iyah diketahui tinggal seorang diri di gubuk reyot yang bisa ambruk sewaktu-waktu. Ia memang memilih tinggal seorang diri, sejak ditinggal meninggal suami dan putrinya. Sekalipun diajak tinggal bersama tetangga, Mak Iyah seringkali merasa tidak nyaman dan justru ingin kembali ke rumah.
Berdasarkan informasi, Mak Iyah sebenarnya dikelilingi sejumlah saudara. Namun, ia enggan untuk tinggal bersama karena lebih kerasan untuk tetap tinggal di rumahnya. Walaupun sudah sangat lapuk, berlubang, dan terbuat dari bilik bambu yang lapuk dimakan usia.



Hal itu, lantas menjadi perhatian Kementerian Sosial yang langsung bergerak cepat. Tim dari Sub Direktorat Validasi dan Terminasi Kementerian Sosial segera berkunjung ke kediaman Mak Iyah. ”Setelah datang dan melakukan pendataan, kami akan memberikan bantuan. Antara lain untuk merehabilitasi rumah Mak Kiyah yang tergolong sebagai rutilahu,” ujar Kasubdit Validasi dan Terminasi Kementerian Sosial RI, Mochammad Slamet Santoso, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Menurut dia, sebenarnya Kemensos sudah mendapat usulan rehab rutilahu sejak 2018. Akan tetapi, langkah tersebut terkendala status lahan yang bukan milik pribadi. Dengan kata lain, hingga saat ini persyaratan terkait status lahan belum terpenuhi.
Slamet pun menjelaskan, akhirnya dilakukan koordinasi dengan ketua RT, RW, desa, kecamatan, hingga Dinas Sosial Cianjur agar segera mengusulkan kembali pengajuan rehabilitasi rutilahu yang ditempati Mak Iyah. Ia mengatakan, adanya usulan dari dinas setempat maka penanganannya pun dapat dilakukan dengan cepat.
”Intinya,Kementerian Sosial RI menunggu usulan secepatnya dari Dinas Sosial Kabupaten Cianjur untuk membantu Mak Iyah ini. Kami menjamin prosesnya tidak akan berbelit-belit,” ucapnya.



Slamet memastikan, akan terus mendorong percepatan penanganan, karena kasus-kasus seperti Mak Iyah bersifat diskresi. Dipastikan ada pengecualian dan tim juga sudah minta secepatnya usulan dari pemerintah daerah agar dapat segera diproses.
Selain itu, Kemensos juga akan mendorong Mak Iyah agar mendapatkan asistensi lanjut usia dari Direktorat Rehabilitasi Sosial dan Lanjut Usia.
Mak Iyah memang terus bertahan untuk tinggal seorang diri dan hanya mengandalkan bantuan dari tetangga selama ini. Tak ada hal lain yang bisa dilakukan wanita tersebut karena tubuhnya sudah sangat renta. Bahkan, bagian tangan Mak Iyah kini sudah tak begitu normal karena pernah terpatuk ular yang masuk dari lubang di rumahnya.
Keinginannya saat ini sangat sederhana, Mak Iyah hanya ingin tidur di kasur empuk di rumah yang tidak berlubang. Pasalnya, selama tinggal di rumah itu Mak Iyah seringkali merasa cemas dan takut saat ada di dalam rumah.
”Emak juga takut karena banyak binatang dari lubang, kan pernah dipatuk ular juga. Tidak mau lagi (kejadian), emak mah tidak mau sakit lagi. Pengen sehat,” ujar Mak Iyah.***

Mak Iyah, a 100-Year-Old Woman, a Kara in Cianjur, Getting Help
Nov 6 2019, 1:30 PM by Shofira Hanan
HOPE to get a more decent life, little by little felt by Rukiyah (100) or familiarly called Mak Iyah. The woman who lives alone in Kampung Baru Kupa RT 05/03, Sukatani Village, Pacet Subdistrict, began to get a lot of help from various parties who empathize with her fate.
For decades, Mak Iyah was known to have lived alone in a decrepit shack that could collapse at any time. He did choose to live alone, since he died his husband and daughter. Although invited to live with neighbors, Mak Iyah often feels uncomfortable and just wants to return home.
Based on information, Mak Iyah was actually surrounded by a number of brothers. However, he was reluctant to live together because it was more comfortable to stay in his house. Although it is very weathered, hollow, and made of weathered bamboo booths with age.



That, then became the attention of the Ministry of Social Affairs who immediately moved quickly. The team from the Ministry of Social Affairs Validation and Termination Sub Directorate immediately visited Mak Iyah's residence. "After coming and collecting data, we will provide assistance. Among others, to rehabilitate the house of Mak Kiyah, which is classified as your routine, "said Head of the Indonesian Ministry of Social Affairs Validation and Termination, Mochammad Slamet Santoso, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
According to him, the Ministry of Social Affairs had actually received a proposal for a routine rehabilitation since 2018. However, the move was constrained by the status of land that was not privately owned. In other words, to date the requirements regarding land status have not been fulfilled.
Slamet also explained, finally coordinated with the heads of RT, RW, village, sub-district, until the Cianjur Social Service to immediately propose again the proposal for rehabilitation of rutilahu which was occupied by Mak Iyah. He said, the existence of a proposal from the local service could be handled quickly.
"In essence, the Indonesian Ministry of Social Affairs is waiting for an immediate proposal from the Social Service of Cianjur Regency to assist Mak Iyah. We guarantee the process will not be convoluted, "he said.



Slamet ensured that he would continue to encourage the acceleration of handling, because cases such as Mak Iyah were discretionary. Certainly there are exceptions and the team has also requested immediate proposals from the local government so that they can be processed immediately.
In addition, the Ministry of Social Affairs will also encourage Mak Iyah to get elderly assistance from the Directorate of Social Rehabilitation and Elderly.
Mak Iyah indeed continued to stay alone and only relied on help from neighbors so far. There was nothing else the woman could do because her body was very worn out. In fact, the part of Mak Iyah's hand is now not so normal because it has been coughed by a snake that entered from a hole in his house.
His wish now is very simple, Mak Iyah just wants to sleep on a soft mattress in a house with no holes. Because, during his stay in the house Mak Iyah often felt anxious and afraid when he was in the house.
"Mother is also afraid because many animals from the hole, snake pecked it too. No longer want (incident), Mother doesn't want to be sick anymore. Want to be healthy, "said Mak Iyah. ***
